page.title: 10Living at an Army Camp 2
page.content: This is what I think about living in an Army Camp.Living in an army camp has its good points and its bad points.It is a very big place so there are lots of places to go.The only problem is that once you've seen a place once you don't won't to go again.Sometimes when you're down in the dumps you feel like you're in prison because there are fences everywhere. There is a play park with see saws, a slide and some swings. There are garages for you to put your caravans in.The houses in the camp are quite nice and they are reasonably big.I have a back garden like most people.We have a front garden as well.There are big fields for you to play on or walk round.I think its quite good living on a army camp.
